termux-setup-storage&&rm -rf ~/storage

server.port = 8080
server.document-root = "/sdcard/Orweb"
server.upload-dirs = ( "/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/tmp" )
index-file.names = ( "index.html" )
mimetype.assign = (
 ".html" => "text/html",
 ".txt" => "text/plain",
 ".css" => "text/css",
 ".js" => "application/x-javascript",
 ".jpg" => "image/jpeg",
 ".jpeg" => "image/jpeg",
 ".gif" => "image/gif",
 ".png" => "image/png",
 "" => "application/octet-stream"
 )
EOF
